reviews.review_msg:
Dr. Joey is a great professor. She has a very unique approach to Marketing which was very practical and humorous at times so that we can stay engaged and understand better. Many of the concepts she taught were so clear that I would be remembering them for a very long time. Thank you for your time and efforts! 

Dr. Jatin Maheshwari

Joey is the best Beedie prof I've had. You can tell she cares about all her students as she take the time to get to know everyone. The class itself if very enjoyable as you get to choose what topic you want to work on for projects.

Joey is one of the best profs I've encountered at SFU. She really makes an effort to connect with her students and give them the best experience possible. There are weekly readings but they are manageable and quick. Topics are quite easy but can be studied in-depth. Group projects make up most of your mark so try to get into a good group! No exams!

Although I'm in accounting, I took this class as a requirement for SFU's CESS and I definitely learned more about real-world marketing in this class than I did in BUS343. It's a well rounded elective for any student wanting to balance their course load and Joey's group assignments/canvas posts/debates are reasonable and interesting to do!
One of the best professors I have encountered during my undergrad degree. She is very understanding and caring. I remember wanting to go to every class as she made it very engaging.

I had Joey in my last semester at SFU and will say she was an amazing prof compared to a lot of the other professors in Beedie. She is very easy to talk to and likes to have everyone in the class engage in discussion. Super nice, and is always looking to improve the course outline with feedback and suggestions from everyone. Would recommend to all!

Joey's the kindest professor I've ever had. Often asked us if due dates were fair with other classes and gave more time if needed. Extremely approachable, has a great sense of humor and makes everyone in the class feel comfortable. Made the class very fun with discussions on interesting case topics every week and debates.  Participate lots!

Joey is a fantastic professor, I took her for BUS 449 and she made sure the class environment was super interactive and inclusive. The class had 2 group debates that you need to prepare for, and class reflections after each class, you can skip up to 2. you will do well as long as you make an effort, and are willing to participate in class.

At first i dreaded taking this class because of the title of 'Ethics in Marketing' and only took it because it was the only marketing course offered. 

I am SO glad i took this class! It was one of my favourite classes ive ever taken, you will have fun in this class and as long as you participate you can do great! 

Awesome prof, awesome class :)

I am a finance major and took BUS449 with Professor Lam.

For not caring a tonne for marketing, I still found quite a lot of value in the way Joey ran her class. The lectures were engaging, and the 2 debates and 1 presentation helped us get comfortable talking in a public business format. 

I would recommend the class and Professor Lam.

Literally one of the best professors I ever had, as others said, you read about ethical dilemmas and discuss them in class and the professor has a magic in creating a welcoming environment for students to participate and actually feel like they want to add to the conversation. 

She's young too so can relate to many things students discuss.

Joey is the best professor I've ever had! The class itself is very enjoyable and is more of an open discussion about what you think of interesting business ethical dilemmas. Joey makes the semester stress free because she's so empathetic and tries to form the class around students' needs. If you're looking for a sign to take this class, this is it!

Joey is an excellent teacher. If you are lucky enough to get into her ethics class, you will have an enjoyable experience. Joey likes to host debates, which might sound intimidating at first but are very fun and educational. You will always learn new things in class. Joey encourages discussion in class and facilitates it well. I recommend Joey.

Great prof! Makes the class super engaging and encourages everyone to participate. There are no exams, and the debates were very insightful and fun to partake in. This is probably one of the only classes where you actually get to know your classmates well and make new friends :)

BUS449 with Joey was one of the best classes I have taken at SFU. The class allows you to explore your thoughts/opinions around sustainability in business in a safe environment. Joey makes sure everyone is heard and is never judged for their opinions. Lectures are required as participation is heavily graded. Would definitely take this class again!

Professor Lam is honestly one of the best professors I have had at SFU. Her lectures are full of fun conversations and interesting ethics-related discussions. She was super chill, caring, and always willing to help. The workload for the class is also light, the highlights take the form of two enjoyable in-class team debates. 

I highly recommend.

Joey really cares about her students and wants them to succeed! There are weekly after-class reflections to voice feedback and concerns. Joey goes the extra mile to make classes more catered to students' preferences. Participation is encouraged and classes are fun due to the interesting marketing ethics topics. Highly recommend taking with Joey!

Joey is a great instructor and her lectures are fun. Participation matters but is easy to achieve as there are many interesting class discussions. She's really passionate about the topic and cares a lot about students and will take the time to respond to each canvas discussion post with quality answers.

Brent is a fun, enthusiastic professor who makes every class interesting. His class is pretty interactive, and participation was the main differentiating factor for who got A's in our class (so speak up!). Reading the weekly cases is mandatory to be able to participate.

Brent is a joy to be around. Even classes on a Monday morning at 9:30AM are less dreadful with him. He's enthusiastic and super adorable (both looks and personality). If you can take a class with him, do it! Definitely one of my favourite professors ever :)

Christine is one of the best professors I have had at SFU. She is very sweet and understanding as a person and very informative as a professor. I had the best time in her class as it was super engaging which made it a very positive environment. If you enjoy marketing, participating and overall a good class I would definitely take her!!

It was a pleasure to have Christine as a professor this semester. She cares about your learning and is willing to support your understanding of the course in various ways. I looked forward to coming to our lectures in the morning. The class is super collaborative, so preparing beforehand with readings will help a lot. Would take her class again!

Christine was one of my favorite profs at SFU. Her lectures were insightful and she always asked engaging questions to further discussion. She's funny and caring to her students and makes it very easy to have an class discussion but she never pressures anyone to participate in class. There are 3 easy pop quizzes though so do the assigned readings.
